Novoselska"},{"name":"created","value":"1579867537238"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"259"},{"name":"description","value":"

Steps to reproduce:

  • menu is unpublished and all orders are deleted
  • menu is published and user should order something again
  • when user opens Order page - ordering button is disabled and named "Ordered" while it should be active button "Order"

{"id":"LR-240","entityId":"2-563","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"VendorReport: Handle error cases"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Nina Novoselska"},{"name":"created","value":"1578128785302"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"240"},{"name":"description","value":"

Acceptance criteria

  • On data load error appropriate message (translated) is shown
  • If a connection with the server is not established the standard No connection page is shown
  • In case of menu absence for the selected date, the No menu page is shown

Report shows how many portions of each dish is ordered for each day

Acceptance criteria

  • Endpoint for this type of report is created
  • All dishes from the current menu should be presented in the report
  • It should display list as Dish - Count
  • Each report entry represents menu dish and its count. If a dish contains several items, items are combined with + sign.
  • Report consists of day related sections

Date should be saved only for Weekly menu page.
Weekly order always display the current week, or next week if there is a menu for it.
Reports display last week that has a menu to generate report

Acceptance criteria

  • Page should have a Week picker on the top
  • page URL should follow next format /reports/menu/DD-MM-YYYY, where MM-DD-YYYY reflects selected date in the WeekPicker
  • page is accessible for Eaters and Foodlords
